name: Rizzo et ux., Appellants, v. Rizzo et ux.

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Eagen and O’Beien, JJ.
Mr. Justice Musmanno did not participate in the decision of this case.
Mr. Justice Cohen and Mr. Justice Roberts took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: Rizzo et ux., Appellants, v. Rizzo et ux.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decrees affirmed, appellants to pay costs.
Mr. Chief Justice Bell dissents.
Mr. Justice Musmanno did not participate in the decision of this case.
Mr. Justice Cohen and Mr. Justice Roberts took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Homer W. King, with him Francis V. Sabino, for appellants.
Edwcurd F, Urbanik, with him Royston, Robb, Leonard, Edgecombe, Miller é Shorgll, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Rizzo et ux., Appellants, v. Rizzo et ux.
Argued October 2, 1968.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Eagen and O’Beien, JJ.
reargument refused December 13, 1968.
Homer W. King, with him Francis V. Sabino, for appellants.
Edwcurd F, Urbanik, with him Royston, Robb, Leonard, Edgecombe, Miller é Shorgll, for appellees.
November 12, 1968:
